item.title: 债券交易商警惕财政部倾向于发行国债
item.description: 投资者担心财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）会在政府的资金组合中更多地倾向于短期资金，以在债务负担不断加重的情况下压低长期资金的收益率。【原文：Investors are bracing for Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent to lean more toward shorter maturities in the government’s funding mix to keep down long-term yields amid a mounting debt burden.】

item.title: 贝莱德基金经理称人工智能衰退不会终结清洁技术的崛起
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）旗下一只主动管理型可持续发展旗舰基金的投资组合经理表示，担心人工智能押注看起来过于泡沫化的投资者，不应该认为推动人工智能发展的清洁技术公司也会陷入同样的泡沫。【原文：Investors worried that artificial intelligence bets look too frothy shouldn’t assume the clean-tech companies powering AI would be trapped in the same bubble, according to a portfolio manager overseeing one of BlackRock Inc.’s flagship actively managed sustainability funds.】

item.title: 微软与澳大利亚 IREN 签订价值 97 亿美元的人工智能云协议
item.description: 微软公司签署了一项约 97 亿美元的协议，从 IREN 有限公司购买人工智能云容量，成为这家澳大利亚公司最大的客户。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has signed an approximately $9.7 billion deal to purchase AI cloud capacity from IREN Ltd., becoming the Australian company’s largest customer.】

item.title: 雅德尼警告称 "牛市过多 "令股市处于回调边缘
item.description: 投资者对股市只会更高的信心似乎不可动摇，这让华尔街最大的乐观主义者之一越来越担心，所有的良好氛围都在挥舞逆势红旗。【原文：Investors’ seemingly unshakeable faith that stocks can only go higher has one of Wall Street’s biggest optimists growing concerned that all the good vibes are waving a contrarian red flag.】

item.description: 如果说在 "反觉醒 "时代，全球金融业正在远离道德投资策略，那么至少该行业的一个角落没有收到备忘录。【原文：If global finance is turning away from ethical investing strategies in the “anti-woke” era, at least one corner of the industry didn’t get the memo.】

item.title: 泰国敲定帮助 200 万借款人的坏账计划
item.description: 泰国已敲定购买价值约 600 亿泰铢（18 亿美元）坏账的计划，该计划将帮助约 200 万个人借款人，并振兴经济。【原文：Thailand has finalized a plan to purchase around 60 billion baht ($1.8 billion) worth of bad debt that will help about two million individual borrowers and revive the economy.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔敦促欧洲央行警惕持续存在的通胀风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔认为，欧洲中央银行必须警惕通胀上行风险，抵制微调政策的诱惑。【原文：The European Central Bank must be alert to upside inflation risks and resist the temptation to fine-tune policy, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 美国加强亚洲安全关系，黑格塞斯访问朝鲜非军事区
item.description: 周一下午，美国国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯访问了划分朝鲜半岛的非军事区，这是他亚洲之行的最后一站，旨在深化地区安全关系以对抗中国，并强调华盛顿对首尔的承诺。【原文：US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth visited the Demilitarized Zone dividing the Korean Peninsula on Monday afternoon, the last stop on his Asia trip aimed at deepening regional security ties to counter China and underscoring Washington’s commitment to Seoul.】

item.title: 白宫称美国将于下周暂停对中国船只征收港口费

item.title: Lenskart IPO 价格引发对印度初创企业估值的担忧
item.description: 上周，Lenskart Solutions Ltd. 8.21 亿美元的首次公开募股在不到五个小时的时间内就被抢购一空。然而，这家眼镜零售商的定价引发了人们对印度初创企业上市后估值是否过高的担忧。【原文：Lenskart Solutions Ltd.’s $821 million initial public offering was sold out in less than five hours last week. Yet, the eyewear retailer’s pricing has sparked concern over whether Indian startups are being valued too richly as they go public.】
